features.title: Powerful color tuning system
description: Mix and match colors not just on the RGB scale but using HSL, CMYK, Cieluv and 4 more.

features.title: Warm and cold colors
description: The color wheel is constructed in such way the left part displays the warm colors, the right part the cold colors.
Choose low contrast colors from the same part of the wheel, high contrast colors from the opposite part of the wheel.

features.title: Better Tint, Shade and Tone
description: By default all other color palette creators use white, black and gray for basic color altering operations.
With this system you can adjust these values with a nifty color picker and make your palette more unique.

features.title: Mix, Blend like in Photoshop
description: Beside changing the brightness and the saturation of your scheme you can also fine tune the luminosity, mix new colors in, and use Photoshop like blending actions like multiply, darken & co.

features.title: Glitch included
description: Some of the tuners are not perfect. If you raise the Luminace to 30% then lower back to 0% you won't find the original color scheme.
This is good. It makes you create more different color schemes, outside of the box.
